I am having a problem with accessing those HTTPS urls that require 
authentication. For instance, when I try to access yahoo login page 
http://login.yahoo.com/config/mail?.intl=us&.lg=us
with the following code, and then obtain the response - response 
shows the same attributes that form it was submitted from:

WebRequest          request;
WebResponse         response;
WebConversation     conversation = new WebConversation();
SubmitButton[] sb = null;
WebForm[] forms = response.getForms();
request = new GetMethodWebRequest( "http://mail.yahoo.com/?.intl=us");
response = conversation.getResponse( request );
sb = forms[0].getSubmitButtons();
forms[0].setParameter("login", "xxx");
 forms[0].setParameter("passwd", "xxx");
request = forms[o].getRequest(sb[0]);
response = conversation.getResponse( request );

Concrete array elements in this sample are used for simplicity. When 
I obtain response from those https urls that do not require 
authentication - everything works fine.
Please, help if you know what the problem is!
